Snow is falling in an Oregon Winter Wonderland this holiday season! Prepare your town for the best Winter Holiday the Wild West has ever seen!
*Brand new quests with new animals, buildings, outfits and items as you prepare for Santa’s arrival!

The Country Fair is comin’ to town! Time to turn your prospering town into a worldwide attraction with fair festivities and the famous Wild West Shooting Gallery!

Bug fixes and improvements, including:

- Cloud saving support
- Frame rate improvements
- Minor UI and general user experience enhancements

Meet the GOLD RUSH crew in the latest update as we celebrate a special “Gold Rush” Edition of The Oregon Trail. The all-star cast from Discovery Channel’s Gold Rush has arrived in Oregon to help you hunt for gold! THE RUSH IS ON!

- Celebrate the up

Minor bug fixes including:
+ Fixed wrong resolution on iPhone 6 on zoom mode
+ Fixed missing rewards from chests
+ Added Push Notifications with Sound
+ Other minor issues
Thanks for conquering the frontier with Oregon Trail: American Settler! This update includes minor bug fixes.
